name: Word Crossy-search link puzzle
description:
Enjoy the excitement of classic word game? Wish to play by simply swiping on the screen? Now there is a completely new word link game waiting for you to take the challenge! By Connecting letters, you get a complete word and fill it into a crossword blank. Challenge yourself and train your brain. All in our Word Cross! So entertaining and totally for free!

Feature:

- More than 3000 levels to search for.
- Easy to play and amusing, Connecting words to build a complete word.
- Crossword style to make the game experience even more interesting.
- The degree of difficulty increasing according to player’s progress.
- No time limits.
